author: Audreyr R
title: Nice little gem
text:
This hotel seems to be in the middle of nowhere but it's wrong.
2 stations by tram to the famous expo Porte de Versailles (a lot of professional exhibitions).
20 mns by tram from Porte de Choisy (China Town)
20 mns walk from rue Daguerre (one of the best street in Paris for the foodies)
10 mns walk from rue didot (few very nice restaurants
2 mns walk from the very famous "Porte de Vanve antiquities market" (Saturdays and sundays).
The breakfast are nice with hot bread / croissants anytime and, real French bread/baguette.
Don't get me wrong, it's mainly frozen food defrozed just before serving but, frankly, it was good, it's all that matter.
Special note for the scrambled eggs: ok, it's not "homemade" but it was by far the best I've ever had in a hotel.
Rooms are nice and spacious,
Daily cleaning, it was always neat.
There is a nespresso machine (wow!) in the room.
There is a proper TV (106cm) and a lot of storage.
And of course absolutely delightful staff at the counter (I really enjoyed the Spanish girl, very nice and helpful).
Nice and affordable, I enjoyed my 10 days stay.
Thank you
Lionel
